properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When morning gilds the skies, My heart awaking cries: May Jesus Christ be praised! Alike at work and prayer To Jesus I repair: May Jesus Christ be praised!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To Thee, my God above, I cry with glowing love, May Jesus Christ be praised! The fairest graces spring In hearts that ever sing, May Jesus Christ be praised!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Does sadness fill my mind? A solace here I find, May Jesus Christ be praised! Or fades my earthly bliss? My comfort still is this, May Jesus Christ be praised!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When evil thoughts molest, With this I shield my breast, May Jesus Christ be praised! The powers of darkness fear, When this sweet chant they hear, May Jesus Christ be praised!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When sleep her balm denies, My silent spirit sighs, May Jesus Christ be praised! The night becomes as day, When from the heart we say, May Jesus Christ be praised!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be this, while life is mine, My canticle divine, May Jesus Christ be praised! Be this thâ€™ eternal song Through all the ages long, May Jesus Christ be praised!{/lang-eng}
